attributes.review: I don’t think this app is working as intended. It kept sending me nude pics of Donald Trump. Weird ‘cause I think I’m asexual now.

attributes.review: This app crashed and glitches multiple times. It is not a good app. I’m not from that “gen-z” thingy. It is simply just a bad app.
